attributes.action: No to US agricultural and good produce in the UK
attributes.background: The Agricultural bill is currently passing through parliament.  If passed as it is it would allow our Government to lower food standards allowing for things like chlorine washed chicken, beef injected with hormones and pork reared on ractopamine.  This will put our farmers at a disadvantage

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition calling for the same action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/326837
